findnearestvert

dist (in/out): minimal distance to the nearest and at the end, actual distance sel: selection bias if SELECT, selected vertice are given a 5 pixel bias to make them further than unselect verts if 0, unselected vertice are given the bias strict: if 1, the vertice corresponding to the sel parameter are ignored and not just biased
